name: Rayblade Chronicles
description:
Hi, im a very beginner game developer, actually just an indie game enthusiast. 

This is a solo project, i made the animation and the code  myself 

I made this prototype inspired from movies and games i like such as Chappie, Castlevania, Devil May Cry and Bakumatsu Roman/Last Blade

I'm a big fan of robot and samurai genre so i hope i can share the exitement to you guys...

This will be a platformers with linear storyline ,some element of RPG (eg..levels, various skill set, items) and various  DMS style hack and slash action, but in 2D ....

If you like the idea and this prototype please consider to comment and give feedback

Your  feedback  will motivate me to develop the game further

Please kindly inform me if theres a difficulty in running the game

* Created using Raylib
